attributes.description:
2010 AUDI RS6 V10 Twin-Turbo Sedan with only 59000km and selling for R599,500 

This Beast comes with a Lamborghini 5.0L V10 Twin-Turbo Engine that produces a Staggering 426KW and 650NM.

The 2010 AUDI RS6 was the most powerful car that AUDI ever build and only 1500 Sedans were ever built. The Sedan does 0 to 100km in 4.5 Seconds and is governed to 250km. 

The Tyres and Brakes have just been replaced. 
 
Finance available through all the Banks and Country Wide delivery can be arranged.
